attributes.action: Petition against insurance companies removing insurance without first informing the insured.
attributes.additional_details:
If i drive without insurance it is illegal so on the flip side- when i've paid for it- it should not be removed without my knowledge. One Call Insurance Services at doncaster did just this and the Police call it a civil dispute- I call it double standards and corruption.
The FSA and FOS don't give a crap and I want law to be altered to stop this occurring to anyone else- what would you say if i'd crashed into your family car and your children were left wheel char bound and found I'd no insurance- and you had no suport?
